# EZDORSA_Lv2

## 問題概要
```
from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long, getPrime, long_to_bytes

p = getPrime(1024)
q = getPrime(1024)
n = p * q
e = 7

m = b"FAKE{DUNMMY_FLAG}"

c = pow(bytes_to_long(m), e, n)
c *= pow(5, 100, n)

print(f"n = {n}")
print(f"e = {e}")
print(f"c = {c}")
```

## 解法
`e`が小さいので`mod`がとられることはなく、単純に累乗根を求めればよい

## Exploit
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long, long_to_bytes

n = 
e = 7
c = 

def find_base(x):
    st = 1
    en = x
    while en-st > 1:
        mid = (st+en) // 2
        if pow(mid,e) <= x:
            st = mid
        else:
            en = mid
    
    return st

assert c % pow(5,100) == 0
c //= pow(5,100)
m = find_base(c)
assert pow(m,e) == c
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```
